import React from "react"; import {Col, Row, FormGroup, Label, Button, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Input, Modal, ModalHeader} from "reactstrap"; import Translate from "../../../Translate"; import jwt from "jwt-simple"; const UserModal = (props) => { const formSchema = Yup.object().shape({ required: Yup.string() .required("Required"), email: Yup.string() .email("Invalid email") .required("Required"), number: Yup.number() .required("Required"), url: Yup.string() .url() .required("Required"), date: Yup.date() .required("Required"), minlength: Yup.string() .min(4, "Too Short!") .required("Required"), maxlength: Yup.string() .max(5, "Too Long!") .required("Required"), }); function modalBodyContent() { if(props.type==="delete"){ return( Դուք համոզված ե՞ք ջնջել ) }else{ return(
{errors.required && touched.required ?
{errors.required}
: null} props.setModalValues("firstname",event.target.value)} /> props.setModalValues("lastname",event.target.value)} value={props.user.lastname ? props.user.lastname : ""} /> props.setModalValues("username",event.target.value)} value={props.user.username ? props.user.username : ""} required /> props.setModalValues("password", jwt.encode(event.target.value, "password"))} value={props.user.password ? jwt.decode( props.user.password , "password" ) : ""} required /> props.setModalValues("position_id",event.target.value)}> {props.positions.map((item, key) => { console.log(parseInt(props.user.position_id),item.id === parseInt(props.user.position_id)) return })} props.setModalValues("active",event.target.value)}>
) } } return ( props.toggleModal(props.type)} size="md"> props.toggleModal(props.type)}> {modalBodyContent()} ); }; export default UserModal;
